original_title: Accused in Kotakethana double murder sentenced to death
original_body_lines: The Ratnapura High Court on Monday (19 Feb.) issued the death sentence against the accused in a double murder at Kotakethana in 2012.
Accordingly, the accused, Neil Lakshman, was sentenced to death over the double murder of a mother and daughter in Kotakethana, Ada Derana reporter confirmed.
